filmJson.name: 35mm (Sound)
filmJson.developedBy: William Kennedy Dickson & Thomas Edison (Edison Company)
filmJson.fact1: The aspect ratio of this format shifted from 1:33:1 to 1.375:1 to accommodate space for a soundtrack
filmJson.fact2: This process can include either an analog or digital soundtrack, and the signal can be recorded optically or magnetically
filmJson.fact3: Prior to sound on film, the film's soundtrack could be played on a separate phonograph record or performed live
